article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZMtUIi hentry entry story-marquee-standard

h2.a: Google Just Killed Google Reader

div.p: Journalists and geeks united in exasperation on Wednesday evening when Google made a very sad announcement: The company is shuttering Google Reader.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZMtUIi&via=Digg&text=Google Just Killed Google Reader

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZmA7sh hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: How Neanderthals' Eyes Contributed To Their Demise

div.p: We've heard a lot of different theories attempting to explain why the hardy Neanderthals went extinct, but this one's probably the most original, if not the strangest. According to a new study, Neanderthals had extraordinarily good vision — an attribute that came at considerable expense.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZmA7sh&via=Digg&text=How Neanderthals' Eyes Contributed To Their Demise

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15NjBVW hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Great Cyberscare

div.p: Why the Pentagon is just razzmatazzing you about those big bad Chinese hackers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15NjBVW&via=Digg&text=The Great Cyberscare

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15NhlOv hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Awesome Doodle That Lets You Know This Book Belonged To Einstein

div.p: Back in the day, people used something called an ex libris to mark the ownership of their books. As expected, Einstein's was more brilliant than most.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15NhlOv&via=Digg&text=The Awesome Doodle That Lets You Know This Book Belonged To Einstein

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZmG7RN hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The NSA Is Training 13 Teams Of Covert Hackers To Attack Other Countries

div.p: For the first time, the United States has officially disclosed plans to develop counterattack measures against foreign nations' cyberattacks.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZmG7RN&via=Digg&text=The NSA Is Training 13 Teams Of Covert Hackers To Attack Other Countries

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XJrDNL hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: MIGHT FORCE NC TO CHANGE LICENSE PLATES

h2.a: Were The Wright Brothers Beaten Into The Air?

div.p: Australian aviation historian John Brown claims to have photographic proof that German immigrant Gustav Whitehead flew over Connecticut in 1901, two years before the Wright Brothers made their first successful flight in North Carolina.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XJrDNL&via=Digg&text=Were The Wright Brothers Beaten Into The Air?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10OePIL hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: AVOID RED LIPSTICK FOR OBVIOUS REASONS

h2.a: The Photos Beg The Question: How Do You Makeup A Porn Star?

div.p: Melissa "Makeup" Murphy is a makeup artist to the porn stars. While she's been doing her job for over eight years, she recently gained attention by posting before-and-after shots of her work on Instagram.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10OePIL&via=Digg&text=The Photos Beg The Question: How Do You Makeup A Porn Star?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZmQ2qw hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: BRAZIL FINDS MORE USES FOR SILICONE

h2.a: Doctors 'Used Fake Fingers' To Clock In For Colleagues At ER

div.p: Biometric clocking-in machines are thought to be foolproof. But some Brazilian doctors find they can pretend their colleagues are at work by using silicone fingers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZmQ2qw&via=Digg&text=Doctors 'Used Fake Fingers' To Clock In For Colleagues At ER

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Y9BcVO hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: WE'RE GONNA NEED A LOT OF SALT

h2.a: Giant Footlong Snails Are Taking Over the World

div.p: Snails the size of footballs are sludging their way across the world, killing crops and carrying meningitis along with them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y9BcVO&via=Digg&text=Giant Footlong Snails Are Taking Over the World

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-13WEj7N hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Rejoice, For Twinkies Will Be Back On Shelves By The Summer

div.p: Your prayers have been answered.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13WEj7N&via=Digg&text=Rejoice, For Twinkies Will Be Back On Shelves By The Summer

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-106zJCI hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Everything You Need To Know About The New Pope

div.p: Here is an excellent profile of Jorge Mario Bergoglio written by the National Catholic Reporter in the days leading up to his election as pope.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/106zJCI&via=Digg&text=Everything You Need To Know About The New Pope

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10LFR3J hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: ALSO CONSIDER CUTTING DOWN ON COAL

h2.a: Chinese Urged To Put Down Their Chopsticks To Save Trees

div.p: Demand for the throwaway implement has rocketed in China recently and now breaches 80 billion sets annually, according to GlobalPost. The trend has become a huge burden on the nation’s forests and lawmakers are determined to address the issue.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10LFR3J&via=Digg&text=Chinese Urged To Put Down Their Chopsticks To Save Trees

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-13W1YFA hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Blind Boy Braving Curb For First Time

div.p: After asking “I can do it?,” all it takes is a reassuring echo of “You can do it” for this four-year-old to curb-stomp his uncertainty and conquer this challenge.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13W1YFA&via=Digg&text=Blind Boy Braving Curb For First Time

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z08l2x hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Here's Why The Navy Doesn't Have Its Own Fleet of Killer Attack Dolphins

div.p: Whatever, Ukraine. Your claims of arming a fleet of dolphins with pistols and knives are dubious. This is why you can’t transform man’s favorite adorable aquatic buddy into sea mammals of death.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z08l2x&via=Digg&text=Here's Why The Navy Doesn't Have Its Own Fleet of Killer Attack Dolphins

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YZLTGO hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: 14 Lousy Web Design Trends That Are Making A Comeback Due To HTML5

div.p: I was on the verge of writing a post about the joys of HTML5, which when combined with CSS3 and Javascript can do some very impressive things. However, having visited a bunch of ‘inspiring’ HTML5 websites I’ve ended up with a slight headache.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YZLTGO&via=Digg&text=14 Lousy Web Design Trends That Are Making A Comeback Due To HTML5

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WGtTH1 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Jorge Mario Bergoglio Elected Pope

div.p: Jorge Mario Bergoglio of Argentina was elected pope on Wednesday to lead the Roman Catholic Church, a prelate announced to huge crowds gathered in St. Peter's Square. He took the name Pope Francis, the cardinal said.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WGtTH1&via=Digg&text=Jorge Mario Bergoglio Elected Pope

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-X7jP4G hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Does Truth Serum Really Work?

div.p: A Colorado judge has approved the administration of “truth serum” to accused mass killer James Holmes, should he plead insanity. The unspecified drug could potentially reveal whether he is faking mental illness. Can you prove that someone is sane by drugging them?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X7jP4G&via=Digg&text=Does Truth Serum Really Work?

div.p: The New York Times announced a complete overhaul of its web presence this week. Here's how it all happened.

h2.a: A Bunch Of Different Ways To Reinvent The Airline Industry

div.p: After taking many flights last year I began to build up a list of things I'd love to see improved. I've thought about every interaction and process that became a nuisance, discomfort or inefficiency to my flight.
